proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params.amount: The amount of shares to sell.
params.creator: The address of the share creator.

params.amount: The amount of shares to unstake and sell.
params.creator: The address of the share creator.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

buyAndStakeShares(address,uint256).notice: Buy and stake a specified amount of shares from a creator.

buyShares(address,uint256).notice: Buy a specified amount of shares from a creator.

createShare(string,string).notice: Create a new share with the specified name and symbol.

emitRevenueClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Emit an event when revenue is claimed by a shareholder.

emitSharesStaked(address,uint256).notice: Emit an event when shares are staked by a shareholder.

emitSharesUnstaked(address,uint256).notice: Emit an event when shares are unstaked by a shareholder.

getBuyPrice(address,uint256).notice: Get the buy price for a specified amount of shares from a creator.

getBuyPriceAfterFee(address,uint256).notice: Get the buy price after fees for a specified amount of shares from a creator.

getPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the price based on the supply and amount of shares.

getSellPrice(address,uint256).notice: Get the sell price for a specified amount of shares to a creator.

getSellPriceAfterFee(address,uint256).notice: Get the sell price after fees for a specified amount of shares to a creator.

getShareInfo(address).notice: Get information about a share created by a specific creator.

sellShares(address,uint256).notice: Sell a specified amount of shares back to the creator.

unstakeAndSellShares(address,uint256).notice: Unstake and sell a specified amount of shares back to the creator.
